page.title: 03BLAKESHALL FARM,WOLVERLEY
page.content: The hamlet of {Blakeshall}lies about 2 miles to the north of {Kidderminster}. { { Blakeshall Farm }has been farmed by the {Bishop }family for over 60 years. It is a {mixed farm}of 140 acres. The local soil is {sandy. { }The main crops are {sugar beet} and {potatoes}.The sugar beet is sent to the {British Sugar Corporation } factory in {Kidderminster}.The potatoes are also marketed in Kidderminster. The farm has a herd of 55 {friesian dairy }cows. There are also 43{heifers},20{calves}and 19{bullocks. The other animals include {pigs}and a small number of{lambs.
